lines.text: Well, um… hm. I think that spell was cast by the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard,</c> but…
Gah, I’m sure there was <c=#FF00FF>something in that book</c> that explains this one.
Hrm. Well, let me know if you figure out something more specific.
Stop Wizard cast some sorta hologram spell here, is how it happened.
